content:
IWithPublicFrontendOrBackend Interface

Definition

The stage of an Internet-facing load balancer definition allowing to add additional public frontends or add the first backend pool.

In this Article

public interface IWithPublicFrontendOrBackend : Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Definition.IWithBackend, Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Definition.IWithPublicFrontend, Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Definition.IWithVirtualMachine<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Definition.IWithBackendOrProbe>
